title: Data Export and Backup UI
description:
Create Data Export Interface with Multi-Format Support

Build a comprehensive data export system that allows users to generate backups and download their records in multiple file formats.

Requirements:
- Implement export UI with format selection (CSV, JSON, XML, Excel)
- Add date range filters to export specific time periods
- Include option to select which data fields/columns to export
- Support batch export for large datasets with progress indication
- Generate downloadable files with appropriate MIME types and file extensions
- Add filename customization with automatic timestamp inclusion
- Implement server-side export logic to handle data serialization
- Include error handling for failed exports with user-friendly messages
- Add export history/log showing past export operations
- Ensure exported data maintains proper encoding (UTF-8) for special characters
- Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse
- Add confirmation dialog showing export size before processing
- Consider memory limits for large exports (streaming vs. in-memory)
- Ensure sensitive data is properly handled and user has permission to export

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Empty datasets or no records matching filter criteria
- Extremely large exports that may timeout
- Special characters in data that could break file formatting
- Concurrent export requests from same user
- Export operations interrupted mid-process
